snippet.title: WARBORN - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Rise up and deploy for battle in the Variable Armour, a technologically advanced suit of war. As the political climate between factions is thrown out of balance and the solar system is engulfed in conflict, lead your strike force of deadly mecha towards victory in WARBORN. Featuring turn-based tactics and quick-fire clashes.

WARBORN launches on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Xbox One and Steam on 12th June 2020!

https://pqube.co.uk/warborn/

Follow PQube Games on social media!
Discord: https://discord.gg/pqubegames 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pqubegames/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PQubeGames 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pqubegames/

#WARBORN
